mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.order_number AS "orderNumber", a.order_state AS "orderState", a.order_trade_number AS "orderTradeNumber", a.order_create_time AS "orderCreateTime", a.order_pay_time AS "orderPayTime", a.order_send_time AS "orderSendTime", a.order_close_time AS "orderCloseTime", a.order_all_price AS "orderAllPrice", a.order_discount AS "orderDiscount", a.order_send_price AS "orderSendPrice", a.order_get_name AS "orderGetName", a.order_get_address AS "orderGetAddress", a.order_get_phone AS "orderGetPhone"
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM watch_order a where a.del_flag = '0'

SELECT b.email AS "userName",
FROM watch_order a,sys_user b where a.del_flag = '0' AND a.user_id = b.id LIMIT #{page.number},#{page.pageSize}

SELECT b.id AS "orderDetail.id", b.watch_id AS "orderDetail.watchId", b.order_watch_serial_number AS "orderDetail.orderWatchSerialNumber", b.order_watch_title AS "orderDetail.orderWatchTitle", b.order_detail_old_price AS "orderDetail.orderDetailOldPrice", b.order_detail_discount_price AS "orderDetail.orderDetailDiscountPrice", b.order_watch_number AS "orderDetail.orderWatchNumber", b.order_detail_picture AS "orderDetail.orderDetailPicture", b.order_detail_state AS "orderDetail.orderDetailState", b.order_detail_time AS "orderDetail.orderDetailTime",
FROM (SELECT * from watch_order wo WHERE wo.del_flag = '0' AND wo.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY wo.order_create_time DESC LIMIT #{page.number},#{page.pageSize}) a LEFT JOIN watch_order_detail b ON a.id = b.order_id

SELECT b.id AS "orderDetail.id", b.watch_id AS "orderDetail.watchId", b.order_watch_serial_number AS "orderDetail.orderWatchSerialNumber", b.order_watch_title AS "orderDetail.orderWatchTitle", b.order_detail_old_price AS "orderDetail.orderDetailOldPrice", b.order_detail_discount_price AS "orderDetail.orderDetailDiscountPrice", b.order_watch_number AS "orderDetail.orderWatchNumber", b.order_detail_picture AS "orderDetail.orderDetailPicture", b.order_detail_state AS "orderDetail.orderDetailState", b.order_detail_time AS "orderDetail.orderDetailTime", b.remarks AS "orderDetail.remarks",
FROM watch_order a LEFT JOIN watch_order_detail b ON a.id = b.order_id WHERE a.id=#{id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO watch_order( id, user_id, order_number, order_state, order_create_time, order_all_price, order_discount, order_send_price, order_get_name, order_get_address, order_get_phone ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{userId}, #{orderNumber}, #{orderState}, #{orderCreateTime}, #{orderAllPrice}, #{orderDiscount}, #{orderSendPrice}, #{orderGetName}, #{orderGetAddress}, #{orderGetPhone} )
mapper.update: UPDATE watch_order SET order_state = #{orderState}, order_trade_number = #{orderTradeNumber}, order_pay_time = #{orderPayTime}, order_send_time = #{orderSendTime} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE watch_order SET del_flag = '1' WHERE id = #{id}
